APP.NAME: Subz
APP.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Privacy-friendly app for managing subscriptions and contracts with notification feature.

OVERVIEW.NAME: Name
OVERVIEW.NOTIFICATION_BEFORE_CANCELATION_PERIOD_S: Notification before cancelation period earliest on
OVERVIEW.NOTIFICATION_BEFORE_CANCELATION_PERIOD_I: Notification before cancelation period in days
OVERVIEW.REMOVE_SUBSCRIPTION_ALERT_MESSAGE: Should the subscription really be removed?
OVERVIEW.DAYS_UNTIL_NEXT_CANCELATION_PERIOD_DEADL: days until last possible cancelation within its period on
OVERVIEW.NO_SUBSCRIPTION_TEXT: Subscriptions can be added using the plus button on the upper right side of the display. The other features in the menu bar are disabled until two subscriptions have been added. Have fun with Subz!
OVERVIEW.CHANGE_CHOOSEN_BILLING_INTERVAL_HELPER: Change the displayed interval of subscription costs between yearly, monthly, weekly and daily.
OVERVIEW.SEARCH_HELPER: Show only subscriptions where the search text matches with name or description.
OVERVIEW.SORT_HELPER: Sort subscriptions by name, costs, next billing or next contract extension.

SETTINGS.HIDE_TOTAL_COSTS_IN_OVERVIEW: Hide total costs in the overview
SETTINGS.HIDE_TOTAL_COSTS_IN_OVERVIEW_HELPER: Otherwise displayed with at least two subscriptions
SETTINGS.SHOW_HELP_TEXTS_IN_OVERVIEW: Show help in the overview again
SETTINGS.SHOW_HELP_TEXTS_IN_OVERVIEW_HELPER: Restores help texts and switches to overview
SETTINGS.NOTIFICATION_BEFORE_CANCELATION_PERIOD_I: Notification before cancelation period in days
SETTINGS.RESTORE_BACKUP_ALERT_MESSAGE: The current data could either be completely deleted and replaced by the backup or the backup can be merged with the current data. While merging each of the last edited subscriptions will be kept and the settings from the backup will be restored.
SETTINGS.RESTORE_BACKUP_ERROR: Error while reading data from backup!
SETTINGS.RESTORE_BACKUP_ERROR_ANDROID: Error while reading data from backup!. Is the backup file Documents/subz-backup.json present?
SETTINGS.RESTORE_BACKUP_SUCCESS: The data has been restored successfully!

NOTIFICATIONS.NOTIFICATION_BODY: The cancelation period of $NAME$ is due on $DATE$.
